String.Source: It was a member of a rival tribe. He was tortured, executed, and then eaten. I was seven.
String.Dest: 这是敌对部落的一员。他被拷打，处死，然后吃掉。我是第七个。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: I'll check.
String.Dest: 我会去检查的.

String.Source: Master, shall a fetch you another plate?
String.Dest: 主人，要不要我再拿个盘子来？

String.Source: So employees aren't necessarily off limits.
String.Dest: 所以没必要不然员工入内。

String.Source: Some people suspect that the position is cursed. This makes securing guests difficult. The master has found this hard to swallow.
String.Dest: 有些人认为这个位置是被诅咒的。这对保卫客人安全造成了困难。大师要正视这个惨淡的事实了。

String.Source: So employees aren't necessarily off limits.
String.Dest: 所以没必要不然员工入内。

String.Source: The master would have taken to drastic measures. You and Eola have done well to prevent it.
String.Dest: 首脑可能采取了严厉措施。你和Eola很漂亮的阻止了事态发展。

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: Verily. The Forsworn have been bad for business. But good for dinner.
String.Dest: 说实话。弃誓者对生意没好处。但对晚饭有好处。

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: Many previous dinner guests were former employees. Including the master's late husband.
String.Dest: 【 很多以前的食客都是这里的前员工。】包括主人的已故的丈夫。

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: If Cosnach were not Imedhnain's cousin, he surely would have been brought to our table by now.
String.Dest: 如果Cosnach不是Imedhnain的表亲，他肯定早就被我们端上桌了。

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: Verily. The Forsworn had been bad for business. But the master said they had been good for dinner.
String.Dest: Verily. The Forsworn had been bad for business. But the master said they had been good for dinner.

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: Many previous dinner guests were former employees. Including the master's late husband.
String.Dest: 【 很多以前的食客都是这里的前员工。】包括主人的已故的丈夫。

String.Source: Lisbet. You two have been doing more than just selling merchant goods.
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特。你们除了卖杂货之外还在做别的生意吧。

String.Source: If Cosnach were not Imedhnain's cousin, he surely would had been brought to the table.
String.Dest: 如果Cosnach不是Imedhnain的堂兄，他肯定已经被端上餐桌了。

String.Source: The host was fantastic, but the spread could have used more meat, less bone.
String.Dest: 主人真是奇思妙想，但这会逐渐用去更多的肉、更少的骨头。

String.Source: There are many disciples here, each with their own preference. Yet the cut of the priest was your choice.
String.Dest: 我们这儿的信徒有很多，人人都有自己的喜好。不过牧师的那一份儿由你来决定。

String.Source: Men taste like men. Mer taste like Mer. Khajiit and Argonians, well...
String.Dest: 人是人味。精灵是精灵味。虎人和蜥蜴人嘛，就...

String.Source: Verily. All meat has its own taste. I was mistaken to compare it to an inferior dish.
String.Dest: 的确。所有的料理都有独有的味道。我就是错在拿它和黑暗料理比。

String.Source: The others I didn't expect. You, on the other hand...
String.Dest: 我对他人不抱什么期望，而你却不同...

String.Source: Verily. For many forest tribes, this is ancient custom. There is no reason for you to express shock.
String.Dest: 的确。对许多森林部落而言，这是古老的习俗。你没有理由表示震惊。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: That must be a Khajiit convention. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: 这一定是虎人的规矩。木精灵用自残的行为作为展开报复的手段。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: It would be improper to bestow honor upon one's sworn enemy.
String.Dest: 居然授予荣誉给不共戴天的敌人，真是太不科学了。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: Nords like you and the master are fond of such conventions. For we Bosmer, dining on the dead is traditionally an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: 你们这些诺德人还什么大师都喜欢这些破传统。对我们木精灵而言，在死人身上吃大餐是一种复仇的仪式。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: The Orcs have interesting rituals. I did not know you honor your enemies. I thought it was only the battle.
String.Dest: 兽人们有些有趣的宗教仪式。我不知道你还挺尊重你的敌人的。我一直认为那只是一场战役罢了。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: The Bosmer consume their own as an act of vengeance. In my memory, our tribesman showed no such charity.
String.Dest: 木精灵用自残的行为作为展开报复的手段。在我的记忆中，我们的族人可没有这样的宽容。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: That must be a Dunmer convention. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: That must be a Dunmer convention. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: It would be improper to bestow honor upon one's sworn enemy.
String.Dest: 居然授予荣誉给不共戴天的敌人，真是太不科学了。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: That must be an Altmer convention. I have not heard Sanyon speak of such. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: That must be an Altmer convention. I have not heard Sanyon speak of such. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: It would be improper to bestow honor upon one's sworn enemy.
String.Dest: 居然授予荣誉给不共戴天的敌人，真是太不科学了。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: 木精灵的传统就是为了复仇而牺牲自己。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: Are you native to Valenwood? It is possible you belong to a tribe who honors the feast and not the Lady.
String.Dest: 你是威木省本地人吗？有可能你是那些相比于女人更喜欢宴会的部落来的。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: That must be an Argonian convention. The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: 这一定是一个亚龙人约定。那些木精灵已经像它们的传统一样把自己作为代价进行了复仇。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: It would be improper to bestow honor upon one's sworn enemy.
String.Dest: 居然授予荣誉给不共戴天的敌人，真是太不科学了。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: The Bosmer have traditionally consumed their own as an act of vengeance.
String.Dest: 木精灵的传统就是为了复仇而牺牲自己。

String.Source: We should honor the dead before we consume them.
String.Dest: 逝者为大（在我们消遣逝者之前要向他们致敬）。

String.Source: It would be improper to bestow honor upon one's sworn enemy.
String.Dest: 居然授予荣誉给不共戴天的敌人，真是太不科学了。

String.Source: How did you join Namira's sect?
String.Dest: 你是如何加入娜米拉的教派的？

String.Source: Through birth. The tradition harks back to the Dawn Era. So it is written.
String.Dest: 追溯血统，其传统可上溯到黎明时代。因此，它被写入。

String.Source: How did you join Namira's sect?
String.Dest: 你是如何加入娜米拉的教派的？

String.Source: Just as old is the worship of The Lady. On Marukh's day, her disciples are called to tribute.
String.Dest: 同样古老的还有对【The Lady】的崇拜。On Marukh's day, 她的门徒都被召来上贡。

String.Source: How did you join Namira's sect?
String.Dest: 你是如何加入娜米拉的教派的？

String.Source: The disciples here all heeded the summons. As did I.
String.Dest: 在这儿的所有门徒都得听从召唤，我也是一样的.

String.Source: How did you join Namira's sect?
String.Dest: 你是如何加入娜米拉的教派的？

String.Source: That was the night I met the master. She had the honor of delivering...and carving the main course.
String.Dest: 那晚我遇见了大师。她有幸实现……并开创了这门主要课程。

String.Source: A patron. Speak to Imedhnain or the master. I am but a humble servant.
String.Dest: 一位顾客。去和Imedhnain或者领主谈谈，我只是个卑微的仆人。

String.Source: A patron. Speak to Imedhnain. I am but a humble servant.
String.Dest: 是顾客啊。跟伊迈德南去说吧。我只是一个卑微的下人。

String.Source: The master says you carve beautifully. You have been rewarded with her flattery. This should please you.
String.Dest: 师傅说你刻得可真漂亮。你得到了她的表扬。这应该让你很高兴。

String.Source: I didn't expect to see either you or Lisbet here.
String.Dest: 我没想到在这看见你或者莉丝贝特。

String.Source: Strange. I made it clear upon our first meeting. This should not be difficult to digest.
String.Dest: 真是怪了。第一次见面的时候我就说清楚了，现在应该不会这么难理解的吧。

String.Source: I don't believe we've met.
String.Dest: 我不相信我们以前有见过面。

String.Source: I don't believe we've met.
String.Dest: 我想我们没见过面。

String.Source: I am Master Lisbet's personal assistant.
String.Dest: 我是莉丝贝特大师的私人助理。

String.Source: You're a cannibal then. So am I.
String.Dest: 如果你是个食人族，那，其实我也是啦。

String.Source: Verily. I did not attend the last banquet. Circumstances resulted in my late arrival.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问。我没有参加最后的宴会。我迟到了，抵达时情况已经发生了变化。

String.Source: You're a cannibal then. So am I.
String.Dest: 如果你是个食人族，那，其实我也是啦。

String.Source: I understand your appetite is inspiring. I will hope to dine with you soon.
String.Dest: 我明白你的胃已经蠢蠢欲动了。希望能尽快与你共进晚餐。

String.Source: I would like to attend one of these dinners.
String.Dest: 我可以出席其中一场宴会。

String.Source: Your arrival is timely. There is a banquet in the works. The host is experienced. The master is looking forward to the feast.
String.Dest: 你来的正好。宴会还没准备好，主人很有经验。大师也十分期待着宴席。

String.Source: I would like to attend one of these dinners.
String.Dest: 我可以出席其中一场宴会。

String.Source: I am unaware of any further details at this time.
String.Dest: 现在我不知道更多的细节。

String.Source: Hogni is a smart man. The bloodier, the better.
String.Dest: Hogni is a smart man. The bloodier, the better.

String.Source: Yes, some of these pieces are still dripping wet. Forsworn, Stormcloaks, adventurers...the freshest meat, however, has yet to be carved.
String.Dest: 没错，有些部分还在滴血呢。弃誓者，风暴斗篷，冒险者...最最新鲜的肉品，不过，（这些）还没经过切割呢。

String.Source: Oh, she'll be quite pleased. This Verulus looks delicious.
String.Dest: 哦，她会很开心的，维鲁鲁斯那温热的尸体看上去很美味。

String.Source: Verily. And he is a priest of Arkay. Thus the feast honors the old ways. Consume your enemies, and the Lady's. So it is written.
String.Dest: 肯定啊。他就是 阿尔凯 祭司。所以这份大餐为传统带来了荣耀。吃掉你的敌人，和女主人的敌人。就是这么写的。

String.Source: The two of you are lovers?
String.Dest: 你们两个是恋人？

String.Source: Not quite. I have made my intentions known. It is up to her to respond.
String.Dest: 不至于。我已经摊牌了，剩下的就看她如何答复了。

String.Source: The two of you are lovers?
String.Dest: 你们两个是恋人？

String.Source: I do not know if she fancies me. Yet her previous lover, a male, proved unsatisfactory. So it is said.
String.Dest: 我不知道她是不是对我有意思，但是他的前任，难以使人满意。只是听说而已。

String.Source: The two of you were lovers?
String.Dest: 你们两个是恋人?

String.Source: Not quite. I had made my intentions known. She had not yet responded at the time of her death.
String.Dest: 差不多。我那时打算表白。但她直到临死前一刻也没有给答复。

String.Source: The two of you were lovers?
String.Dest: 你们两个是恋人?

String.Source: I did not know if she fancied me. Yet her previous lover, a male, proved unsatisfactory. So it is said.
String.Dest: 我不清楚她是不是迷恋于我。但她的前一任情人，那个男人，似乎无法令人满意，所以说嘛...

String.Source: What is it you do here?
String.Dest: 你在这里做什么？

String.Source: I am Master Lisbet's personal assistant. So she has said.
String.Dest: 我是莉丝贝特大师的私人助理. 这是她说的.

String.Source: What is it you do here?
String.Dest: 你在这里做什么？

String.Source: I was the late master's personal assistant. With Imedhnain in charge, I have none. So it is said.
String.Dest: 我曾是上一任领主的私人助理。也就是说，Imedhnain在位期间内，我一无所有。

String.Source: Oh, I don't need to buy anything. I just wanted to talk.
String.Dest: 噢，我啥也不买。我就想聊聊。

String.Source: The answer is the same. It is not my place. I am Master Lisbet's personal assistant. My place is by her side. So she has said.
String.Dest: 答案是相同的。这不是我的位置。我是主人莉丝贝特的私人助理。我的位置是在她身边。她如是说道。

String.Source: Oh, I don't need to buy anything. I just wanted to talk.
String.Dest: 噢，我啥也不买。我就想聊聊。

String.Source: The answer is the same. It is not my place. It should be by the master's side. So it is said.
String.Dest: 答案是相同的，这不是我的地盘，他应该在他的主人身边，就是这样。

String.Source: I am here to assist Eola with preparations. As are you.
String.Dest: 我来这儿是为了帮爱欧拉做准备工作。你也一样。

String.Source: The honored guest has arrived. As has the main course.
String.Dest: 既然我们尊贵的客人来了，上主菜吧。

String.Source: The master is quite satisfied. So she has said. It is a treat to see.
String.Dest: 主人很满意。所以她说。看到它就是一大乐事。

String.Source: For a moment, I believed our streak of misfortune would leave her permanently crestfallen.
String.Dest: 有那么一瞬间，我觉得这点挫折恐怕会让她一辈子抬不起头来。

String.Source: It appears that assessment was made in haste.
String.Dest: 我们似乎估算的太草率了。

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: Imedhnain is the master's apprentice. His duties are to learn the trade and manage the store in the master's absence.
String.Dest: Imedhnain是大师的学徒。他的职责是学会做生意，在大师不在的时候管理商店。

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: Cosnach, whose current whereabouts are...unknown, serves as the porter. He handles the shipment and retrieval of merchandise.
String.Dest: Cosnach，那些流向到……不知道的地方，像服务员一样服务着。他掌握着装载并检索货物。

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: I assist the master in the preparation of dinner.
String.Dest: 大师在准备晚饭，我给他打下手儿。

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: Imedhnain was the master's apprentice. With her death the duties of managing the store are now his.
String.Dest: Imedhnain was the master's apprentice. With her death the duties of managing the store are now his.

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: Cosnach, whose current whereabouts are...unknown, remains as the porter. He handles the shipment and retrieval of merchandise.
String.Dest: Cosnach, whose current whereabouts are...unknown, remains as the porter. He handles the shipment and retrieval of merchandise.

String.Source: I thought she already had one or two those.
String.Dest: 我以为她已经有其中的一两个了。

String.Source: My role was to serve the former master with the preparation of dinner.
String.Dest: 我的职责是为前主人准备晚饭。.

String.Source: She's also a Wood Elf. You two probably have much in common.
String.Dest: 她也是个木精灵。你们俩肯定有很多共同语言。

String.Source: She asked if I would consider being her apprentice. I did not find this pairing palatable. I prefer a master who employs hard discipline.
String.Dest: 她问我是否想做她的学徒。我却没什么兴趣。我更喜欢一个训练严格的大师。

String.Source: She's also a Wood Elf. You two probably have much in common.
String.Dest: 她也是个木精灵。你们俩肯定有很多共同语言。

String.Source: The master says she is impatient. Judging by the state of her plate, I am in agreement. Let us hope she has left enough room for the main course.
String.Dest: 主人说她不耐烦了。看了眼她的盘子，然后表示同意。希望她给主菜留够了肚子。

String.Source: Nimphaneth intrigues me.
String.Dest: 尼姆菲拉斯谋害我.

String.Source: Nimphaneth is...gentle for a warlock. In the old tongue her name means "the wood." As such, she watches over the trees.
String.Dest: 尼甫奈斯作为术士表现的很……绅士。在古语中她的名字意味着“森林”。如同她的名字一般，她也守望着树林。

String.Source: Nimphaneth intrigues me.
String.Dest: 尼姆菲拉斯谋害我.

String.Source: She takes great care to ensure the guests are happy. She makes conversations flow as steadily as the wine.
String.Dest: She takes great care to ensure the guests are happy. She makes conversations flow as steadily as the wine.

String.Source: Wait, what's for dessert?
String.Dest: 等等，那甜点呢？

String.Source: If I had a choice, chilled brain. If I knew frost magic, I would prepare the meal myself. But I defer to the master and the mages.
String.Dest: 我这是没的选啊，冻疮脑子。如果我会冰霜魔法，我就自己准备这顿饭了。但我听从主人和法师的命令。

String.Source: Sounds like you're her personal chef.
String.Dest: 听起来你是她的专属厨师。

String.Source: No, I do not cook the meals. I simply prepare them.
String.Dest: 不，主厨的不是我。我只打打下手。

String.Source: Sounds like you're her personal chef.
String.Dest: 听起来你是她的专属厨师。

String.Source: The master has a very specific palate. It requires careful planning to sate it.
String.Dest: 主人喜欢的口味儿非常特殊。这就需要周密的计划来满足于它。

String.Source: Sounds like you're her personal chef.
String.Dest: 听起来你是她的专属厨师。

String.Source: The master is also fond of inviting guests, but only those with good taste.
String.Dest: 主人也特喜欢邀请宾客，不过仅限那些味道还行的家伙。

String.Source: Sounds like you're her personal chef.
String.Dest: 听起来你是她的专属厨师。

String.Source: Yet it has been some time since the last banquet. I currently serve her alone.
String.Dest: 不过距离上次宴会已经有一段日子了。现在是我一个人侍奉她的。

String.Source: Sounds like you were her chef. Not something you want to admit to, cannibal.
String.Dest: 听起来你像是她的厨师。这不太像是你想承认的事，食人者。

String.Source: Then it was you who carved the disciples, but you did not taste. The flesh must be consumed within three nights. So it was told.
String.Dest: 正是你杀了那些信徒，但你却没有吃掉他们。 如同被告知的那样，这些肉必须在三天内解决。

String.Source: Sounds like you were her chef. Not something you want to admit to, cannibal.
String.Dest: 听起来你像是她的厨师。这不太像是你想承认的事，食人者。

String.Source: At first, I thought my late arrival was a gross offense. Now I see it was at the Lady's behest.
String.Dest: 起初，我以为我迟到是一个严重的罪过。现在我明白它是夫人的吩咐 。

String.Source: Sounds like you were her chef. Not something you want to admit to, cannibal.
String.Dest: 听起来你像是她的厨师。这不太像是你想承认的事，食人者。

String.Source: Forsworn delayed my attendance to the banquet. When I entered the shrine, all the disciples were deceased.
String.Dest: 弃誓者耽误了我出席宴会。当我进入神殿时，所有的信徒都已经死了。

String.Source: Sounds like you were her chef. Not something you want to admit to, cannibal.
String.Dest: 听起来你像是她的厨师。这不太像是你想承认的事，食人者。

String.Source: As such, I consumed the bodies in the old way. I feasted on them for nearly a week. Even the master. It was the Lady's will.
String.Dest: 因此，我遵循古老的方式来处理那些尸体。整整一个星期我都在尽情享用它们，包括大师的尸体。这是那位女士的愿望。

String.Source: Sounds like you were her chef. Not something you want to admit to, cannibal.
String.Dest: 听起来你像是她的厨师。这不太像是你想承认的事，食人者。

String.Source: Now, I am a slave to yours.
String.Dest: 现在，我是你的奴隶。

String.Source: I think it depends on the person. Verulus tasted like pheasant.
String.Dest: 我觉得还是看人把。维鲁鲁斯的肉吃起来跟野鸡一样。

String.Source: The shamans of the wood might say you lack experience. Their opinions are mine.
String.Dest: The shamans of the wood might say you lack experience. Their opinions are mine.

String.Source: I think it depends on the person. I bet Verulus tastes like pheasant.
String.Dest: 我想这个因人而异，我敢打赌维鲁鲁斯吃起来与野鸡肉味道差不多。

String.Source: The shamans of the wood might say you lack experience. Their opinions are mine.
String.Dest: The shamans of the wood might say you lack experience. Their opinions are mine.

String.Source: (Speechcraft) I'm afraid after a feast I am too exhausted to hear a story.
String.Dest: （口才）我害怕在宴会上听到一个太长的让我疲惫的故事。

String.Source: Very well. If there is no other choice.
String.Dest: Very well. If there is no other choice.

String.Source: Oh, come on. Just tell me.
String.Dest: 噢，拜托，只管告诉我。

String.Source: I apologize. The master's desires come first. There will be time after dinner.
String.Dest: 我道歉。主人的欲望是第一位的。晚饭后会有时间的。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looks like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真泄气。莉丝贝特看起来像那种赞成奴隶制的人。

String.Source: Verily. The master is forceful. When it comes to dinner, she has a specific palate. It requires careful planning to sate it.
String.Dest: 视情况而定。主人脾气很不好。当吃晚餐时，她的口味很挑剔。想要满足她需经过细致地筹备。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looks like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真泄气。莉丝贝特看起来像那种赞成奴隶制的人。

String.Source: The master was also fond of inviting guests, but only those with good taste.
String.Dest: 主人也很喜欢邀请客人，但仅限于那些有品位的。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looks like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真泄气。莉丝贝特看起来像那种赞成奴隶制的人。

String.Source: Yet it has been some time since the last banquet. I currently serve her alone.
String.Dest: 不过距离上次宴会已经有一段日子了。现在是我一个人侍奉她的。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looked like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真没劲，莉丝贝特看起来像是个赞同奴隶制的人。

String.Source: Verily. The master was forceful. When it came to dinner, she had a specific palate. It required careful planning to sate it.
String.Dest: 没错。主人有很高的地位。当她来吃晚饭的时候，由于她特殊的口味，我们必须小心的烹调，让饭菜满足她的要求。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looked like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真没劲，莉丝贝特看起来像是个赞同奴隶制的人。

String.Source: The master was also fond of inviting guests, but only those with good taste.
String.Dest: 主人也很喜欢邀请客人，但仅限于那些有品位的。

String.Source: That sounds exhausting. Lisbet looked like the type who approves of slavery.
String.Dest: 真没劲，莉丝贝特看起来像是个赞同奴隶制的人。

String.Source: Yet it had been some time since the last banquet. It is unlikely there will be another.
String.Dest: 然而自上一次宴会已经有段时间了，目前不太像将有一场宴会的样子啊。

String.Source: What do you do, then? This store is not a charity. Pick up a broom, Elf.
String.Dest: 那么你在做什么？本店又不是搞慈善。拿把扫帚，精灵。

String.Source: I apologize, patron, but I only answer to the master. I am her personal assistant. So she has said.
String.Dest: 我向你道歉，守护者，但我只能接受工会大师的询问。我是她的私人助手，这是她亲自吩咐过的。

String.Source: What do you do, then? This store is not a charity. Pick up a broom, Elf.
String.Dest: 那么你在做什么？本店又不是搞慈善。拿把扫帚，精灵。

String.Source: I apologize, patron, but I only answered to the master. Now that she is gone, I know not who I answer to. So it is said.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉，客人。但我只回答主人。而现在她走了，所以说我都不知道该向谁回答了。

String.Source: If you're not an apprentice, why do you refer to Lisbet as your master?
String.Dest: 如果你不是一个学徒，那么你为什么称呼莉丝贝特为师傅？

String.Source: It is not her desire that I do so. I insist on calling her my master. I am fond of the word.
String.Dest: 我之所为并非她之所愿。是我坚持把她叫作我的主人的。我喜欢这句话。

String.Source: If you're not an apprentice, why do you refer to Lisbet as your master?
String.Dest: 如果你不是一个学徒，那么你为什么称呼莉丝贝特为师傅？

String.Source: I would prefer the term mistress. But I fear it would make the master uncomfortable.
String.Dest: 我更愿意用【女主人】这个词。不过我怕让【 主人】不爽。

String.Source: Gunnar, no doubt. Her late husband.
String.Dest: 甘那, 毫无疑问是她已故的丈夫。

String.Source: Five years ago. The master had the honor of first taste. It did not need to be said. Such was her eagerness to feast.
String.Dest: 五年前。主人有幸第一次体验。这点并不需要说出来。就是这样她渴望着盛宴。

String.Source: It was okay. Verulus was a bit chewy.
String.Dest: 很好。维鲁鲁斯很有嚼头。

String.Source: It would be wiser to cook the meat after the first taste. But the first taste must be dined raw.
String.Dest: 尝一下以后再烹饪这肉是个明智的做法，但是第一口吃下去就是生的了。

String.Source: I trust all the disciples are here? It's so nice of you to gather in one place.
String.Dest: 我信任的所有弟子都在这里?很好的聚集在一个地方.

String.Source: The master has said the same. It has been many moons since the last banquet. Eola is a fine host.
String.Dest: 大师也说过同样的话。从最终的宴会之后出现了很多的月亮。Eola是一位好主人家。

String.Source: How would you describe the taste to someone who hasn't tried it?
String.Dest: 你如何将一种味道描述给从未尝过的人?

String.Source: Outsiders believe it has the flavor of a roast boar. It is an example of how myth and folklore are quick to become fact. So it is told.
String.Dest: 外人相信它的味道就像烤野猪。所以说这就是一个神话和民间传说如何快速成为现实的例子。

String.Source: How would you describe the taste to someone who hasn't tried it?
String.Dest: 你如何将一种味道描述给从未尝过的人?

String.Source: If you travel to Hammerfell, you may come across flightless bird. It has black wings, and a blue neck. It has a similar taste to men.
String.Dest: 如果你去往落锤省旅行，你会遇见那种不会飞的鸟。它们长着黑色的翅膀，脖子是蓝色的。吃起来的味道跟人差不多。

String.Source: How would you describe the taste to someone who hasn't tried it?
String.Dest: 你如何将一种味道描述给从未尝过的人?

String.Source: Yet cooked, mortal flesh does indeed have the aroma of a wild boar. This may be the cause of the confusion.
String.Dest: 而经过烹煮，人类的肉就会发出野猪肉般的香气。也许这点会令人迷惑。

String.Source: (Groan) I'll never get those last two minutes of my life back.
String.Dest: （抱怨）我再也取不回我生命中的这两分钟了。

String.Source: The story is interesting enough. Surely I have failed in its telling. The master must devise a suitable punishment for me.
String.Dest: 这个故事很有趣，但我无疑讲得很糟糕。主人一定会想要处罚我的。

String.Source: That seems like fairly limited duties for a personal assistant.
String.Dest: 对于私人助手来说那似乎是相当有限的职责了。

String.Source: My duties are extensive. The master has a very specific palate. It requires careful planning to sate it.
String.Dest: 我的职责很宽泛。主人在味觉方面非常挑剔，得被小心谨慎地伺候。

String.Source: That seems like fairly limited duties for a personal assistant.
String.Dest: 对于私人助手来说那似乎是相当有限的职责了。

String.Source: The master was also fond of inviting guests, but only those with good taste.
String.Dest: 主人也很喜欢邀请客人，但仅限于那些有品位的。

String.Source: Yet it has been some time since the last banquet. I currently serve her alone.
String.Dest: 不过距离上次宴会已经有一段日子了。现在是我一个人侍奉她的。

String.Source: That seems like fairly limited duties for a personal assistant.
String.Dest: 对于私人助手来说那似乎是相当有限的职责了。

String.Source: That is not true. My duties were quite extensive. The master had a very specific palate. It required careful planning to sate it.
String.Dest: 并不是这样。我的职责十分宽泛。我的主人有很特别的品味，需要细心的规划才能满足。

String.Source: Preparing one meal a day must have been a fairly easy job.
String.Dest: 一天只做一顿饭肯定算是件容易事吧。

String.Source: The master was also fond of inviting guests, but only those with good taste.
String.Dest: 主人也很喜欢邀请客人，但仅限于那些有品位的。

String.Source: Preparing one meal a day must have been a fairly easy job.
String.Dest: 一天只做一顿饭肯定算是件容易事吧。

String.Source: Yet it had been some time since the last banquet. It is unlikely there will be another.
String.Dest: 然而自上一次宴会已经有段时间了，目前不太像将有一场宴会的样子啊。

String.Source: Preparing one meal a day must have been a fairly easy job.
String.Dest: 一天只做一顿饭肯定算是件容易事吧。

String.Source: The master likes the Thalmor. She also thinks him daft. Nimphaneth says he is either of questionable intelligence or a resourceful genius.
String.Dest: 大师和梭默一样，也觉得他很蠢。纽姆凡斯说他既不是精神有问题也不是天才。

String.Source: Sanyon. The Altmer warlock.
String.Dest: 桑岩。一个高精灵术士。

String.Source: As you command, champion. Who do you wish to discuss?
String.Dest: 如你所愿，战士。你想讨论谁呢？

String.Source: Care to share your thoughts on the other disciples?
String.Dest: 你还在乎去向其他信徒传播你的思想？

String.Source: The master and I agree. Tonight will be a fine feast indeed.
String.Dest: 主人和我都将赞同。今晚将是一次不错的盛宴。

String.Source: After dessert is probably best.
String.Dest: 而最好的可能是在甜点之后。

String.Source: Very well. The master will be disappointed. I will have to be properly disciplined. So she has said.
String.Dest: 非常好，主人要失望了。我必须要完全遵守纪律。她确实是这么说的。

String.Source: On second thought, I don't really care for stories.
String.Dest: 而第二个想法，我还真的不关心这故事。

String.Source: She crept up near his bed. Listened to the pace of his breath.
String.Dest: 她爬到他的床边。感受着他呼吸的节奏。

String.Source: What did she do?
String.Dest: 她做了什么？

String.Source: When she was sure he was asleep, she leaned out over his neck. Bared her teeth. And took a chunk of flesh.
String.Dest: 当她确信他真的睡着的时候，她靠在他的脖子旁。露出牙齿。然后咬下了一块鲜肉。

String.Source: What did she do?
String.Dest: 她做了什么？

String.Source: When the taste flooded her mouth, she cared not for revenge. Only another bite. It would not come until 10 years later. At a banquet like this.
String.Dest: 当这种滋味涌入她的嘴里时，她忘记了复仇。只有另一种痛楚。它不会在未来10年出现。尤其像这种宴会上。.

String.Source: What did she do?
String.Dest: 她做了什么？

String.Source: Very well. As a young girl, the master often played a variation of "tag" with the other local children.
String.Dest: 很好。在她还是小孩时，主人常和当地小孩玩一种游戏，“猫捉老鼠”的变体。

String.Source: Yes, I'd like to hear it.
String.Dest: 且说与我听听。

String.Source: Like the spread of a disease, those who were tagged remained "It." The game continued until one person remained. The game was called "Vampire."
String.Dest: 就像是一种疾病的传播，那些被标记的人最终会被称为“它。”游戏将会继续，直到只剩一人留下。这个游戏被叫做“吸血鬼。”

String.Source: Yes, I'd like to hear it.
String.Dest: 且说与我听听。

String.Source: The master's brother took the name to an extreme. He was wont to bite the other children. The master, being slow of foot, suffered for it.
String.Dest: 大师的哥哥真是人如其名到了极致。他常常去撕咬其他的孩子。而大师因为跑得慢，一直遭受他的折磨。

String.Source: Yes, I'd like to hear it.
String.Dest: 且说与我听听。

String.Source: During one game, her brother bit the master so hard she burst into tears. So that night, as is the old way, she sought her revenge.
String.Dest: 在那场比赛上，她的弟弟咬得主人如此之狠，她忍不住放声大哭。于是当天夜里，她用老方法寻求报复。

String.Source: Yes, I'd like to hear it.
String.Dest: 且说与我听听。

String.Source: The master's desire to feast takes precedence.
String.Dest: 大师希望能在宴会上占有先机。

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: This has not stopped me from consulting the priestesses. I wish to learn how best to improve her willingness to mate.
String.Dest: 哪怕与女祭司商量也没能阻止我。我想知道怎样做才能让她愿意与我一起滚床单。

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: The best aphrodisiac, however, has always been a good dinner guest.
String.Dest: The best aphrodisiac, however, has always been a good dinner guest.

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: The master's desire to feast took precedence.
String.Dest: 大师们更倾向于开个派对。

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: This had not stopped me from consulting the priestesses. I wished to learn how best to improve her willingness to mate.
String.Dest: 这并未动摇我找那个女祭司的决心。我想知道怎么才能提起她交配的意愿。

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: The best aphrodisiac, however, had always been a good dinner guest.
String.Dest: 然而最好的春药，莫过于一个吃晚餐的婀娜的客人。

String.Source: Mistress? Perhaps you two are better off serving Dibella.
String.Dest: 女主人？也许你俩更适合去侍奉迪贝拉.

String.Source: The Bosmer were shape-shifting creatures. Y'ffre's bargain gave us form.
String.Dest: The Bosmer were shape-shifting creatures. Y'ffre's bargain gave us form.

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Yet not all chose this one. Beasts of the wild are just such mortal Bosmer. So it is told. Thus to eat meat is to dine on mortal flesh.
String.Dest: 然而不是所有的都选了这条路子，野外的猛兽就仅仅是致命的木精灵而已。所以就像说的那样，吃烹饪好的肉本质上和茹毛饮血没有任何区别。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Then there are the terms of the Green Pact. The Meat Mandate demands the enemy be consumed within three days of death.
String.Dest: 那是绿色协议中的条款。食尸令的要求是敌人的尸体得在他们死后三天之内被吃完。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Breaking the pact would be unwise. Lest our bodies lose form.
String.Dest: 违反这个契约可能是不明智的，恐怕我们会灰飞烟灭。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: That is...troubling. You are not here to feast. So you have said.
String.Dest: 那是...麻烦。你不该参加宴会的，你的确这么说过。

String.Source: Cannibalism is savage and a crime against nature.
String.Dest: 食人既野蛮又违背自然法则。

String.Source: If that is what the leaves and the Lady wills. Yet your words are false.
String.Dest: 如果那是香草美人【the leaves and the Lady，脑补待校对】所愿，那你的言辞极为虚伪。

String.Source: Cannibalism is savage and a crime against nature.
String.Dest: 食人既野蛮又违背自然法则。

String.Source: Your actions make your words unnecessary. Yet it is not as you said.
String.Dest: 你不需解释什么，你的行动都说明了。 然而与你说过的不一样。

String.Source: Cannibalism is savage and a crime against nature.
String.Dest: 食人既野蛮又违背自然法则。

String.Source: I fail to see what you mean. Meat has no voice.
String.Dest: 我不明白你的意思。肉块儿可发不出声音。

String.Source: I like to imagine them screaming when I eat them.
String.Dest: 我一边吃它一边想象它们的尖叫声。

String.Source: As champion, you must carve the guest of honor for the disciples. The master suggests starting by plating the entrails.
String.Dest: 作为主人的勇士，你必须为信徒们把我们的贵宾大卸八块。主人建议把内脏作为前菜。

String.Source: What does this ritual entail?
String.Dest: 这个仪式会造成什麽样的后果？

String.Source: From there, it is best to break open the rib cage. You will have your choice of organs. I suggest you leave the liver for the master.
String.Dest: 是那里啦，最好是从肋骨那里打开。你可以自由的选择这些器官，不过我建议你把肝脏留给大师。

String.Source: What does this ritual entail?
String.Dest: 这个仪式会造成什麽样的后果？

String.Source: Next, the arms and the legs. Traditionally the tips are lopped off, as the nails are difficult to digest. But Hogni will be angry if you do.
String.Dest: 接下来，胳膊和腿。按惯例，手指和脚趾都应该被砍掉，因为指甲是很难被人彻底消化的。但如果你这么做的话，Hogni会发火的。

String.Source: What does this ritual entail?
String.Dest: 这个仪式会造成什麽样的后果？

String.Source: I find the brain to be most appetizing. If you would plate that as well, I would be delighted to consume that first.
String.Dest: 我觉得脑子的味道最棒了。要是你能把脑子弄来，我很高兴把它吃掉先。

String.Source: What does this ritual entail?
String.Dest: 这个仪式会造成什麽样的后果？

String.Source: The kennel master believes his war dogs are ferocious. It is because they consume human flesh.
String.Dest: 犬舍主人相信他的战犬足够凶猛。因为它们是吃人肉的。

String.Source: Banning. What exactly has he been feeding his dogs?
String.Dest: 班宁。他到底给他的狗喂了什么东西？

String.Source: It is an odd practice, considering Banning himself is human.
String.Dest: 考虑到班宁自己是个人类，这真是个奇怪的做法。

String.Source: Banning. What exactly has he been feeding his dogs?
String.Dest: 班宁。他到底给他的狗喂了什么东西？

String.Source: The master tells me, however, it is the kennel master's dogs that should fear him.
String.Dest: 师父告诉过我，但是，训狗师的狗应该害怕他才对。

String.Source: Banning. What exactly has he been feeding his dogs?
String.Dest: 班宁。他到底给他的狗喂了什么东西？

String.Source: The bloodiest beef in the Reach. The butcher is under the impression that this joke never gets old. Much to the master's regret.
String.Dest: The bloodiest beef in the Reach. The butcher is under the impression that this joke never gets old. Much to the master's regret.

String.Source: The butcher Hogni Red-Arm.
String.Dest: 屠夫胡格尼·红臂

String.Source: The butcher is an otherwise agreeable fellow. The local hunters despise him, however. So it is told.
String.Dest: 那个屠夫从某种意义上来讲是个随和的人。不过当地的猎人们讨厌他。据说是这样。

String.Source: The butcher Hogni Red-Arm.
String.Dest: 屠夫胡格尼·红臂

String.Source: It's because he purchases his meat almost exclusively from the Orcs. And Banning.
String.Dest: 这是因为他从兽人那里进了一批特有的肉。还有班宁那里。

String.Source: The butcher Hogni Red-Arm.
String.Dest: 屠夫胡格尼·红臂

String.Source: Traditions are born from needs and desire. So it is written, and so it is told. Such is the case for many of the disciples.
String.Dest: 传统从生存需求中产生，并因此流传下来。大多数所谓原则都是这样。

String.Source: I assumed consuming mortal flesh was less about religion and more about taste.
String.Dest: 我认为食用人肉这件事与其说为了信仰还不如说是味道。

String.Source: For others, it is ritual. Yet I do my best not to impose on the master.
String.Dest: 对另一些人来说，这是仪式。我尽我一切可能不会影响到主人。

String.Source: I assumed consuming mortal flesh was less about religion and more about taste.
String.Dest: 我认为食用人肉这件事与其说为了信仰还不如说是味道。

String.Source: Your palate could be superior to mine. I do not taste the difference. The master makes a similar claim about her kin.
String.Dest: 你的味蕾比我更加优越。我无法品尝出它们的区别来。《关于她的家族这位大师做了一个类似的声明》。

String.Source: Adventurers are the tastiest.
String.Dest: 探险者最可口了。

String.Source: As the wood says, and the Lady wills. The first taste must be raw. Blood and bile. Many disciples prefer the entire course to be such.
String.Dest: 正如木精灵所说的，那女的将会这么做。第一口必须生吃，许多信徒喜欢整具尸体都是鲜血与胆汁。

String.Source: The food on this table looks a little fresh.
String.Dest: 桌上的食物看起来挺新鲜.

String.Source: Forsworn, Stormcloaks, and adventurers. Although I am not sure why you would be concerned. They are not likely to be acquaintances.
String.Dest: Forsworn, Stormcloaks, and adventurers. Although I am not sure why you would be concerned. They are not likely to be acquaintances.

String.Source: That's not what I meant. Who were these people?
String.Dest: 我不是那个意思。这些人是谁？

String.Source: I fail to see what you mean. Meat has no voice.
String.Dest: 我不明白你的意思。肉块儿可发不出声音。

String.Source: Did these people have names? I want to imagine them screaming when I eat them.
String.Dest: 这些人有名字吗？在我吃他们的时候很喜欢幻想他们的尖叫。

String.Source: Good. Then the answer would not have disappointed you.
String.Dest: 很好。我想结果一定不会让你失望.

String.Source: Just curious. Nothing more.
String.Dest: 就是好奇，没别的。

String.Source: Your sympathy toward the dinner is unhealthy. He is no longer a guest. He is food.
String.Dest: 你对这只晚餐的同情是不正常的。他已经不是客人了。他是食物。

String.Source: She better be pleased. I sacrificed a good man.
String.Dest: 她最好感到满意。我牺牲了一个好人。

String.Source: Ah, true. It does seem you are the one person who prefers more blood more than Hogni.
String.Dest: 啊,真的。 看起来你似乎是一个比Hogni还要更渴望鲜血的人。

String.Source: As a vampire, that is a story I can appreciate on multiple levels.
String.Dest: 身为一个吸血鬼，我能从那个故事听出很多弦外之音。

String.Source: The master thought as you do. We could have caged our guests, fed them. The cost was too steep. It is far easier to find an overweight porter.
String.Dest: 大师的想法跟你一样。我们可以把客人们关起来，饲养起来。这成本太高了。还不如找个大胖子呢。

String.Source: The best guests are the kind that are force fed and well marbled.
String.Dest: 酒足饭饱的客人才是最好的客人。

String.Source: The master will be disappointed to hear it. I will tell her immediately so that I may be punished.
String.Dest: 主人会很失望听到这件事的。我得马上告诉她即使我可能会受到惩罚。

String.Source: The story was fine, your telling of it lacked passion and narrative flair.
String.Dest: 故事本身还不错，但是你缺少了热情跟描述的天分。

String.Source: And you have it. I presume it will enhance the flavor of your dinner guests. The Lady's gifts are no small thing.
String.Dest: 你有这个，我想这会提高你客人的情趣。这位女士的礼物可不是小东西。

String.Source: I just wanted the Namira's boon.
String.Dest: 我想要得到纳米拉的恩惠。

String.Source: The master will be pleased to hear it.
String.Dest: 主人会很高兴听到这个的。

String.Source: Thank you, I rather enjoyed that story.
String.Dest: 谢谢，我更想听那个故事。

String.Source: It is a story I have told many times. Master prefers I save it for dessert.
String.Dest: 这个故事我说过很多遍了。主人希望我在吃甜点的时候再说。

String.Source: Lisbet mentioned her brother. What exactly happened to him?
String.Dest: 莉丝贝特提到过她哥哥，他发生了什么事吗？

String.Source: Verily. Would you like to hear it now?
String.Dest: 不一定。你想现在就听我说吗？

String.Source: That was a wonderful feast. I believe you promised me a story.
String.Dest: 那可是个精彩至极的盛会。我相信你还欠我一个故事。

String.Source: A fellow Bosmer, yes, but I require a more forceful master. Working under Lisbet has allowed me to remain productive.
String.Dest: 一个木精灵伙伴可以，但我需要一个更列害的大师. 在莉丝贝特手下工作让我一直很能干.

String.Source: Why not stay with Nimphaneth?
String.Dest: 为什么不待在尼姆菲拉斯身边?

String.Source: That is difficult to swallow. I have made diligent efforts to garner her attention myself.
String.Dest: 这还真是难以下咽啊。我已经很努力的想得到她的注意了。

String.Source: It was nothing.
String.Dest: 这没什么。

String.Source: The Altmer, Sanyon, is a Thalmor. It was merely a guess.
String.Dest: 高精灵桑岩，其实是一个梭默人，我猜的。

String.Source: Stormcloaks?
String.Dest: 风暴斗篷？

String.Source: The master trusts that I will not overstep my boundaries.
String.Dest: 师父相信我一定会安守本分。.

String.Source: Sounds like a perfectly healthy relationship to have with one's employer.
String.Dest: 听起来与某人的雇主有非常良好的关系。

String.Source: I provided her with the information. She is now aware of her options. I will obey the master's wishes regardless of the outcome.
String.Dest: 我给他提供消息。她现在已经意识到了自己的选择。无论如何我都会坚决遵守主人的意愿。

String.Source: Sounds like a perfectly healthy relationship to have with one's employer.
String.Dest: 听起来与某人的雇主有非常良好的关系。

String.Source: The master trusted that I would not overstep my boundaries.
String.Dest: 主人相信我不会逾矩。

String.Source: Sounds like a perfectly healthy relationship to have with one's employer.
String.Dest: 听起来与某人的雇主有非常良好的关系。

String.Source: I provided her with the information. She was aware of her options. I would have obeyed the master's wishes regardless of the outcome.
String.Dest: 我给她提供了信息。她对她的选项很清楚。我遵从主人的愿望无视了后果。

String.Source: Sounds like a perfectly healthy relationship to have with one's employer.
String.Dest: 听起来与某人的雇主有非常良好的关系。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Farewell.
String.Dest: 再会。

String.Source: The master found your performance at the feast to be commendable. You should be pleased to have earned her attention.
String.Dest: 主人发现你在盛宴的表现值得表扬。你应该因为获得她的注意而感到高兴。

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: Speak.
String.Dest: 说。

String.Source: Imedhnain was leaning over the counter the other day. The master had to pull her eyes away from his tender region.
String.Dest: 有一天Imedhnain俯身在柜台上，主人不得不从他的脆弱区域上移开她的目光。

String.Source: But the master prefers her liver crusted...
String.Dest: 但是大师宁愿她的肝脏老化...

String.Source: Imedhnain canceled the additional shipment of flour. I apologize master, it wasn't supposed to be on the ledger.
String.Dest: 额外装送面粉的计划被伊迈德南取消了。我向您道歉，主人。账目上不该出现这个。

String.Source: My deepest apologies for the delay master.
String.Dest: 我为主人的迟到表示深深的歉意。
